1 var PacketReader = require('../../PacketReader'),
  2   PacketWriter = require('../../PacketWriter'),
  3   CloseQueryPacket = require('../../CloseQueryPacket'),
  4   CAS = require('../../../constants/CASConstants');
  5 
  6 exports['test_CloseQueryPacket'] = function (test) {
  7   test.expect(18);
  8   console.log('Unit test ' + module.filename.toString() + ' started...');
  9   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
 10   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
 11   var options = {casInfo : [0, 255, 255, 255], dbVersion : '8.4.1'};
 12   var closeQueryPacket = new CloseQueryPacket(options);
 13 
 14   closeQueryPacket.write(packetWriter);
 15   test.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[3], 14); //total length
 16 
 17   test.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[4], 0); //casInfo
 18   test.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[5], 255); //casInfo
 19   test.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[6], 255); //casInfo
 20   test.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[7], 255); //casInfo
 21 
 22   test.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[8], CAS.CASFunctionCode.CAS_FC_CLOSE_REQ_HANDLE);
 23   test.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[12], 4);
 24   test.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[16], 0);
 25   test.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[20], 1);
 26   test.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[21], 0);
 27 
 28   packetReader.write(new Buffer([0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 255, 255, 255, 0, 0, 0, 0]));
 29 
 30   test.equal(packetReader._packetLength(), 12);
 31 
 32   closeQueryPacket.parse(packetReader);
 33 
 34   test.equal(closeQueryPacket.casInfo[0], 0); //casInfo
 35   test.equal(closeQueryPacket.casInfo[1], 255); //casInfo
 36   test.equal(closeQueryPacket.casInfo[2], 255); //casInfo
 37   test.equal(closeQueryPacket.casInfo[3], 255); //casInfo
 38 
 39   test.equal(closeQueryPacket.responseCode, 0);
 40 
 41   test.equal(closeQueryPacket.errorCode, 0);
 42   test.equal(closeQueryPacket.errorMsg, '');
 43   console.log('Unit test ended OK.');
 44   test.done();
 45 };
 46
